description: Lists the applications to which a specified principal is assigned. You must provide a filter when calling this action from a member account against your organization instance of IAM Identity Center. A filter is not required when called from the management account against an organization instance of IAM Identity Center, or from a member account against an account instance of IAM Identity Center in the same account.

parameters.name: InstanceArn
parameters.description: Specifies the instance of IAM Identity Center that contains principal and applications.

parameters.name: PrincipalId
parameters.description: Specifies the unique identifier of the principal for which you want to retrieve its assignments.

parameters.name: PrincipalType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the principal for which you want to retrieve its assignments.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Filters the output to include only assignments associated with the application that has the specified ARN. ApplicationArn (string) --- The ARN of an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationAssignments
nested_items.description: An array list of the application assignments for the specified principal.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application to which the specified principal is assigned.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the principal assigned to the application.

nested_items.name: PrincipalType
nested_items.description: The type of the principal assigned to the application.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
